name: Unlit Path
description:
Welcome to Unlit Path, a twin stick topdown survival horror.

Play as a young boy returning to the family mansion after several years in boarding school. When you arrive, the house is in the dark, your family is gone, and monsters are lurking in the dark.

It's with the help of your flashlight and the messages left by your loves ones that you will try to survive

If you are using a QWERTY keyboard use WASD to move.

Unlit path is an end of studies project carried out by :

Richard VERET: Project Manager, 3D Scenery Modeling, 3D animation, 3D Integration  (https://richard-veret.itch.io)

Tom HAUTENBERGER : 3D Modeling, Texturing  

Arthur MENSAH : Playmaker Programming

Julien FETAS : VFX, UI Design, Sounds Integration (https://www.artstation.com/julien_fetas)

Senthuran VELLUPILLAI : Sound Designer, Composer
